Container.Name: rclone
Container.Overview: Rclone is a command-line program to manage files on cloud storage. It is a feature-rich alternative to cloud vendors' web storage interfaces. Over 70 cloud storage products support rclone including S3 object stores, business and consumer file storage services, as well as standard transfer protocols. [br] This is a CLI tool. Please edit the **Post Arguments** accordingly. See documentation: https://rclone.org/commands/
